title: Season Ending Week for Barca?
description:
The FC crew continue to react to Barcelona's UCL shortcomings against Inter on Wednesday, look ahead to this weekend's clash with Real Madrid and question if Barcelona's season will be over by this time next week. Plus, the guys argue if Liverpool can avoid a heavy defeat to Man City this weekend and give Newcastle some praise ahead of their visit to Man United.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Barcelona's season on the brink of failure; Would Real Madrid still take Mbappe?; Panel predictions for Liverpool vs Man City
